inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Eig
inputs.description: A boolean. Calculate eigenvariate(s) instead of mean (output will have 0 mean).

inputs.name: Environ
inputs.description: A dictionary with keys which are a value of type 'str' and with values which are a value of type 'str'. Environment variables.

inputs.name: Ignore exception
inputs.description: A boolean. Print an error message instead of throwing an exception in case the interface fails to run.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Input file for computing the average timeseries.

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: An existing file name. Input 3d mask.

inputs.name: Nobin
inputs.description: A boolean. Do not binarise the mask for calculation of eigenvariates.

inputs.name: Order
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Select number of eigenvariates.

inputs.name: Out file
inputs.description: A file name. Name of output text matrix.

inputs.name: Output type
inputs.description: 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_pair_gz' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti'. Fsl output type.

inputs.name: Show all
inputs.description: A boolean. Show all voxel time series (within mask) instead of averaging.

inputs.name: Spatial coord
inputs.description: A list of items which are an integer (int or long). <x y z>	requested spatial coordinate (instead of mask).

inputs.name: Terminal output
inputs.description: 'stream' or 'allatonce' or 'file' or 'none'. Control terminal output: `stream` - displays to terminal immediately (default), `allatonce` - waits till command is finished to display output, `file` - writes output to file, `none` - output is ignored.

inputs.name: Transpose
inputs.description: A boolean. Output results in transpose format (one row per voxel/mean).

inputs.name: Use mm
inputs.description: A boolean. Use mm instead of voxel coordinates (for -c option).

name: ImageMeants
description: ImageMeants, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: ImageMeants).
